column1: #Text=WANTED, by a Respectable Young Woman, a SITUATION as Improver to the Sewing Machine, in the Tailoring Business.
#Text=WANTED, an Intelligent PERSON, residing in Stalybridge, to represent a wealthy Fire and Life Insurance Company.
#Text=There is already some business, which the person appointed would participate in.
#Text=—Address, with real name, A. 8., at the Printers.

#Text=WANTED, immediately, for America.— About 100 or 200 MECHANICS of the following description would be guaranteed steady employment, for about two years certain, and to commence work at once on arrival, viz.
#Text=Fare from England to he paid by the parties themselves, but the railway charges from New York to place of destination will he paid by employer.
#Text=—For further particulars early application may be made to SAMUEL VERNON, Licensed Passage Broker, 47, Warringtonstreet, Market Place, Ashton-under-Lyne.
